content.location:
It is located left of

Welcome to the New Dark Ages

and just right of the left edge of the south face.

climbs.name: Welcome to the New Dark Ages

content.description: Climb past 7 bolts (red hangers). This is the best route of its length/grade in the Four Corners area.
content.location:
It is located left of

Search For a Cure

.

content.description:
On the west face just left of the arete, climb past 3 bolts on plated rock (5" long bolts), step right to a bolt under a roof, then step right again to clip a hidden bolt above a roof. Finish with the top crux of

Winter is Coming

.
content.location:
It is left of

Open Project

.

content.description: This climb is protected by 9 bolts (grey hangers) and optionally nuts to 3/8" and 1 each of cams 3/8" to 1". It has good pro for a sport ascent and great pro and short runouts with optional gear. The route follows a right-facing corner of superb rock. At the top, step left into short corner up to chains.
content.location:
It is located on the right side of the crag left of

Minefield

.

content.description: Climb protecting with 7 bolts (green hangers) + 1"to 1 1/4" cams.
content.location:
It is left of

Hail the Apocalypse

.

content.description:
This route seems .12 or harder. Start left of

Winter is Coming

left of an arete. Clip a green hanger, then climb up a blunt arete with shiny hangers (.10) to a roof. Clip a red hanger under a roof, and pull the roof (grey hangers) on big, sharp holds with multiple one arms and high lockoffs.
content.location:
It is left of

Winter is Coming

.

content.description: Climb past 7 bolts (red hangers). The rock on this route is unlike any other on the crag. The route is covered with small holds, some are solid, some are loose, and some could go either way. On TR, it feels .9. On lead, it's intense but safe, .9+/ 10a, 55'.
content.location: This is located on the right edge of the crag.

content.description:
Climb past 7 bolts (mostly 5") (brown or red hangers) on continuous, overhanging, .10/.11 moves. Loose holds are everywhere, but the free line (Oct. 2020) has no loose holds. It is probably .12a onsight flash. At bolt 7, traverse right to

Hardwired's...

chains. This is a dreaded free lead but provides a strangely satisfying pump.
content.location:
It is located left of

Hardwired...

on the left edge of the west face.

content.description:
Climb protecting with 5 bolts (brown hangers) + 1 each of cams 3/8" to 2 1/2", 2 each of cams 3/4" and 1 1/2", 1 each of nuts tiny to 1/2". Start a few feet left of

Trumpocalypse

, and climb a continuous crux. The rest is on rock that climbs similar to blocky, water polished granite. This is 75' long.
Climb past 7 3/8" x 5" bolts. Good rock becomes loose rock.
content.location:
It is located left of

Warrior's Call

.
